long_description: Discreet yet bright, the Knog Blinder 1 front bike light offers low-profile mounting with brilliant, presence-alerting light output to enhance your visibility to others when you're out for a ride. Single white LED puts out up to 20 lumens of light to increase your visibility to oncomers; anodized aluminum facing offers a choice of color and style. Waterproof construction ensures lasting performance no matter the weather. Tailor the lighting to your preferences with a 5 different lighting modes, from a bright steady mode to a battery-saving flash mode and options between. Battery life ranges from 2 hrs. in constant mode up to 11 hrs. in eco-flash mode; battery can be recharged via the integrated USB plug. Mounting the Knog Blinder 1 front bike light is easy and tool-free thanks to the flexible silicone strap and clip; fits handlebars and frame tubes with diameters 22 - 32mm.
short_description: Discreet yet bright, the Knog Blinder 1 front bike light offers low-profile mounting with brilliant, presence-alerting light output to enhance your visibility to others when you're out for a ride.
